body:
The somewhat inaccurately-named `ibm-xl.patch` and its successor `ibm-xl-3.9.1.patch` contain fixes that apply not only to `xl` and `xl_r` builds, but to Cray `cce` as well.

This PR updates the `cce` constraints so that
- `ibm-xl.patch` is applied to `netlib-lapack @3.7:3.8` on cce
- `ibm-xl-3.9.1.patch` is applied to `netlib-lapack @3.9.1` on cce

Note that the `ibm-xl-3.9.1.patch` has been accepted upstream and should be in future releases of `netlib-lapack`.
title: netlib-lapack: Apply ibm-xl-3.9.1 patch to cce
